step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting in a comfortable position! Remember to keep your whole body muscles gently tightened as you inhale.
Good job placing your hands on your abdomen. This helps you feel the movement.
Excellent inhale! You're doing well with tightening your muscles and visualizing the fluid movement. Keep up the slow, controlled breath.
Fantastic exhale! Relaxing your muscles and visualizing pushing fluid out is exactly right. You completed the first repetition well.
Second repetition starting strong! Remember to maintain that comfortable posture and gentle muscle tightening as you begin to inhale.
Well done keeping your hands on your abdomen for the second set. This helps you connect with the breath.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening for the second round! Keep visualizing that fluid moving towards your chest. You're doing great.
Perfect exhale! Relaxing your muscles and visualizing the fluid expulsion is spot on. You've completed both repetitions with excellent form.

exercise_summary: You did a fantastic job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while gently tightening your whole body, and exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing. Keep practicing this to help your lymphatic system.
